title: Strengthening App Development Practical Skills: Instructional Design for Improving Satisfaction in Online IT Certification Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level IT knowledge and professional experience in social sciences
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five core factors (interaction, course structure, support systems, etc.) that determine satisfaction in online IT certification programs
Learners can perform case analyses through problem-based group activities and propose satisfaction improvement strategies
Learners can analyze satisfaction fluctuation patterns over four semesters and establish sustainable learning strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
